title: Database Management System: A Study of Increasing Impact of NoSQL Databases
abstract: As the need and utilization of data in the modern world are increasing day by day, we need effective., scalable., and better ways to store and access huge lumps of data. Choosing the right Database Management System is an important decision while developing any major application. One such tool gaining popularity is NoSQL Databases. In this Review Paper, we tried to explore various theses and research to gather information on NoSQL Databases and Non-Relation Database Management Systems and analyzed the various reasons for the sharp increase in their popularity in recent times. The objective is to provide clear information about what NoSQL Database is and how it can increase the productivity of the companies. (Abstract)
venue: 2023 International Conference on Advanced Computing & Communication Technologies (ICACCTech)

journal.name: 2023 International Conference on Advanced Computing & Communication Technologies (ICACCTech)
